name: Shabby Dive
description:
Shabby Dive

CONTENT WARNING: ALCOHOL CONSUMPTION

Are you a true gunslinger? Or maybe you can't hit a bull’s rump with a handful of banjos.

If your finger is not as slow as a crippled turtle, take down 3 opponents quicker than half a second and the hop juice is on me.

Seeing double? Points are doubled!

Ah, and don't shoot the fellas with white flags.
Now pull your six-gun out and if you get tired, press 'P' to pause.

Credits Author

Jakub Niemyjski

Music

Old West Gunslingers (By Steve Oxen)
from www.fesliyanstudios.com
